poem:
### Parenting in the Digital Age

Smart whispers in the air  
timers ticking gentle commands—  
"Alexa, teach them greens,  
grant me five more minutes  
of peace."  
  
Digital lullabies cradle  
the restless, mothers sigh  
quiet victories, while  
echoes of bedtime stories  
drift softly down wired halls,  
a modern symphony  
of nurture.
